General.Name: Zhejiang Fenglong Electric Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Zhejiang Fenglong Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of garden machinery engines and electric machines, hydraulic control systems, and auto parts in China. Its products are used in lawn mowers, chainsaws, hedge trimmers, hair dryers, and other garden machinery. It offers ignition coils, flywheels, and cylinders; forestry equipment; hydraulic components; and car parts. The company also exports its products. It primarily operates under the Fenglong brand name. Zhejiang Fenglong Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
General.Address: No.5 of Nilu Road, Shaoxing, China, 312351
